ygData.subject: Scourges betrayal, and the new faction....
ygData.msgSnippet: Maxima sat next to Teletran 1 with no response back from Battera yet. Rapping her claws upon the metal of the console, her head rested upon her palm, pondering

Subject: Scourges betrayal, and the new faction....
Message-ID: <bana88+ipgv@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0

Content-Length: 9882
X-Mailer: Yahoo Groups Message Poster
From: "dishpanhandninja" <foxmanroar1@...>

X-Yahoo-Profile: dishpanhandninja

  Maxima sat next to Teletran 1 with no response back from Battera 
yet. Rapping her claws upon the metal of the console, her head rested 
upon her palm, pondering what to do. She hated waiting around.
Getting up, she left the Bridge & went in search of Scourge.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:39 AM]:  Scourge was typing at a counsel, he always 
planned out thins ahead of time. right now he was working on a to-do 
list. 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:41 AM]:  Eventually she found him as she entered 
the room. However, found it a little difficult to say anything in 
particular. Perhaps it was loneliness that drove her to find him. 
Being close to organic was making it rather difficult for her. 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:41 AM]:  She finally spoke.. "I .. see that you 
are busy." 
 FoxManRoar1 [2:42 AM]:  He turned and his hand went to his face and 
the prime mask he wore... "Y-yes, i was working on a new objective... 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:43 AM]:  Her crimson optics watched him, barely 
narrowing. "I see.. I shall not ask what then."  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:44 AM]:  She found it difficult to really say 
anything.. more of not sure what to do... she wanted something, but 
she didn't know what.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:44 AM]:  "Completing my fathers work..." He pulled 
off the mask and slid it off. 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:47 AM]:  A bit edgy at the mere mention about 
Megatron. he optics glanced down. "I see," was all she could say. She 
felt foolish in a way. Why was she here actually... she had no idea.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:48 AM]:  He moved aside and looked up at 
her... "Maxima come here for a moment." 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:49 AM]:  Her optics glancing about, then as she 
turned back towards the door, he asked her to approch him.
She turned back around & walked hesitantly towards him. she was 
silent.. this was somewhat unusual for her to be like this. Perhaps 
being at the Ark was not a wise idea.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:54 AM]:  He placed an arm around her waist and gently 
held her close. "I am working on a program here, that if my actions 
to come change my future, that i will be able to survive... What i 
have here is a list of powerful creatures in this area, and the 
metalogical technology that the autobot C R chamber has, i plan on 
creating a back up body in other words... i need your help, i will 
fuze the two greatest of these animals into one, and as a machine it 
will hopefully be a suitable body, i have these so far..." 
 FoxManRoar1 [2:56 AM]:  He showed her a creature like a griffon, a a 
few other forms, all based on mechanation. 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:57 AM]:  Him holding her close was odd yet 
comforting, numbed her... but as he spoke, she kinda snapped out of 
it. "A fuzor?" she glanced over them, pondering & curious.. yet 
alarm.  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:57 AM]:  She couldn't seem to say anything to 
either be for the idea or against it. but.. then again, she was 
somewhat a fuzor now.. after the recent upgrade.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:59 AM]:  "A transmetal." He looked at her and guided 
one of her hands over the different forms, all of these will appear 
organic in nature but will be fully robotic." 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:02 AM]:  Her optics watched as her clawed hands 
wer brought to the beasts. "Our technology is far more advanced now 
than what the Quints attempted with many, many millenia ago." she 
shivered with the thought of the transorganics. 
But, her optics watched her clawed hands, she glanced a couple times 
back & forth between him & the fuzors. 
 FoxManRoar1 [3:04 AM]:  He smiled. "All these forms are powerful, 
but we both now my father had taste... I beleive this one will be a 
good one." He placed her claw onto a Griffon a powerful combination 
of Leopard, and Falcon.... 
(Brb) 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:07 AM]:  (OK)
She pondered this a moment. "Possible. He did use a fortress that 
looked much like one of the human's mythological creatures." 
Pausing for a moment. "Creating a being is not easy." she stated..  
 FoxManRoar1 [3:13 AM]:  He smiled. "You forget my ship was from the 
future, we have tech that would make your head spin Maxi."  
 EmprzAnastazia [3:14 AM]:  She cocked a brow & looked at him. This 
sparked her interest. "Indeed...."  
 FoxManRoar1 [3:17 AM]:  "I told you, we may have what it takes to 
give you your old body back." He smiled and thought back to the 
crash, and the Dinos destroying most of the C R Chambers... but there 
was one left... 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:19 AM]:  She smiled just slightly. The idea of not 
being stuck in the partial organic form... was fabulous. "That's 
rather good to hear. Thank you."  
 FoxManRoar1 [3:20 AM]:  He smiled and looked down at her then back 
to the screen, "Have you ever heard of the Terracons?" 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:21 AM]:  Shakes her head, "no."  
 FoxManRoar1 [3:22 AM]:  "If your willing you'll be the second 
member, and as for the autobots..." He raised his cannon and the four 
missiles slid out and armed... 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:27 AM]:  She smirked. "termination. Charming." she 
straightened, but rested her hand upon his shoulder. "Hydras was 
unable to deal with Rodimus Prime recently," she stated sourly as her 
memory of her battle with Rodimus surfaced. But, it was still 
bittersweet as Nightlight became Blackstorm. 
Pondering. "As to the 2nd member, I will think about your offer. I 
will always remain true to the Decepticon cause..." she paused. "& 
Megatron." stated a little softly 
 FoxManRoar1 [3:31 AM]:  He looked at her, and something in him 
twisted and he reached up and pulling back the prime helmet slid off 
and he let it drop to the ground, I will always be a decepticon, but 
i look at you and I see what could have been, Megtron lives on in my 
memories, he will always be alive in your CPU, but the decepticons of 
this time are ignorant and slothful, join with me and we will build a 
grand future." He placed his other arm around her and looked into her 
eyes. 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:36 AM]:  Her crimson optics moved to meet his 
optics as well. His speech was rather moving. Something that 
triggered by emotions, triggered more emotions. She had never felt 
such an ache, some strange feeling. It was something she didn't care 
for.Though it was perhaps something she had to deal with until she 
left this era. 
Her optics gazed at him. Softly she spoke "Megatron has existed no 
matter what. & has held many names: Galvatron, Neotron, Hydras... as 
well as many forms."  
 FoxManRoar1 [3:38 AM]:  Scourge stepped back. "In life we have 
destineys, and choices, you have chosen destiney, what i'm about to 
do is choose a new one... He turned and the cannon begand to release 
a small lick of flame... 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:40 AM]:  She stood there watching him, curious & 
bewildered. "Scourge?" 
 FoxManRoar1 [3:45 AM]:  He stopped and turned. "Maxima, I'm going to 
create a new world, i hope you'll be there when i'm done." He opned 
the main doors and aimed the four missiles and fired them all, and 
with one quick burst of flames caught Mirage in the blast...

Sludge, Swoop, Snarl, and Slag had no time to prepare and the damage 
they received placed them in stasis lock, grimlock wounded lay 
uncontious and mirage cried out as the flames tore through his 
organics. "Welcome to the newage Autobots!" 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:49 AM]:  She stood there, not in horror, but 
curiousity. Curious as to why she did that to them. Not that she 
cared about them whatsoever. 
Her optics went back to Scourge. "I'm curious as to why you need me?" 
she smirked. 
 FoxManRoar1 [3:54 AM]:  He turned to her and smiled. "I left the 
historian alive, and you my dear Maxima, you will be the perfect 
edition, you know the future to come, the past that has been, and the 
location of all our brothers, and sister on this planet, not to 
mention you know where our enemies lay in wait, and..." He walked 
over to her and placed one arm around her, "you bring out the best in 
me." 
 FoxManRoar1 [3:54 AM]:  "Or should i say the worst?" 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:58 AM]:  She smirked, glancing down a moment. That 
Megatron side in him. Possible she thought. Like it was with the 
others, Scourge could just be another version of Megatron... it was 
always possible. Stranger yet, he was also partly Prime.
Thens he looked up at him, still smirking. But.. said nothing. 
 FoxManRoar1 [4:00 AM]:  He looked down at her and lowered himself 
down on one knee and he smiled. "I'm not him... i could never be him, 
but I not prime either, I am scourge." 
EmprzAnastazia [4:07 AM]:  She looked at him. "Are are much like 
him."pausing a moment. "The Scourge I knew was not one of great 
intelligence." she winced somewhat, "How in the world did you get 
stuck with that name?" 
 FoxManRoar1 [4:08 AM]:  Scourge drew back hurt. "I created it 
myself, i am a Scourge upon the Autobot cause..." 
 EmprzAnastazia [4:11 AM]:  Smirking again. "Interesting way to put 
it." 
She patted his shoulder, "I'm sure.. you will do him justice to the 
name & the Decepticon cause." was all she said.  
"Perhaps I should return to Predacon Base for a time then return." 
she stated, standing before him.  
 FoxManRoar1 [4:14 AM]:  He nodded. "Yes, i suppose i should try and 
calm my uninjured comrade... and find shelter before the Grimlock 
awkens..." He smiled and took her hand. "My base is not far from 
here, remember that." He walked outside and towards Quetzalcoatl. 
 EmprzAnastazia [4:17 AM]:  She went out with him, having been a 
while in the sun since she rekindled the Ark....
Her optics glanced about, then she turned to Scourge. "I will 
eventually return." she said.  
 FoxManRoar1 [4:18 AM]:  "I'll be waiting." He watched her leave... 
 EmprzAnastazia [4:19 AM]:  she weakly smiled at him, then trotted 
off away from him, leapt into the air, transformed into some funky 
looking aircraft with animal features & soared off in the direction 
of the Predacon base.
